workWithUS.title: Join the NovaNest Professional Team
workWithUS.subtitle: Become a valued member of our expert network and contribute to the success of innovative startups.
workWithUS.description: Are you talented, creative, and professional, and eager to contribute to the growth of innovative startups? NovaNest invites you to join our professional team and work alongside experienced mentors, sharing your skills and expertise to help startups achieve success.

benefits.title: Financial Benefits
items: Hands-on experience and collaboration with early-stage startups
Compensation for your projects and contributions
Opportunity to participate in successful projects and benefit financially

benefits.title: Recognition and Prestige
items: Official introduction on NovaNest website and social media
Participation in workshops, events, and projects as a specialist
Features in specialized media and newsletters

benefits.title: Professional Growth & Learning
items: Learning and collaborating with mentors and international teams
Access to NovaNest webinars, classes, and bootcamps

benefits.title: Networking Expansion
items: Membership in NovaNestâ€™s professional network in Iran and Canada
Direct connections with founders, investors, and VCs
Participation in private gatherings and exclusive events

benefits.title: Personal Brand Development
items: Showcase your skills and expertise in projects and educational programs
Co-create specialized content with NovaNest (videos, podcasts, articles)
Highlight your experience in your dedicated NovaNest Professional profile

benefits.title: Real and Social Impact
items: Contribute to the growth of talented startups and teams
Collaborate on innovative projects with social impact
Opportunities to participate in NovaNest social responsibility programs

specialPerks.title: Exclusive Perks
items: Invitations to internal and international events
Access to NovaNest co-working space if needed
Receive official certification and accredited membership
Priority collaboration with NovaNest startups

workWithUS.callToAction: Join the NovaNest Professional Team today and bring your experience, expertise, and creativity to help shape the next generation of startups.

startUp.subTitle: Ø¯Ø±Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ù‡ Ù¾Ø±ÙˆÚ˜Ù‡ Ø´Ù…Ø§
formContent: Thank you for your interest in seeking investment from NovaNest. This form is designed to help us understand your startup, its potential, and your vision as an entrepreneur. By providing detailed and accurate information, you enable our team to evaluate your business efficiently and fairly.
Please take your time to answer all questions thoughtfully. The information you provide will remain confidential and will only be used for the purpose of investment evaluation.
Completing this form is the first step toward a potential partnership and investment with us. We look forward to learning more about your startup and exploring how we can support your growth.

MVP.description: MVP is a version of a product with just enough features to be usable by early customers who can then provide feedback for future product development. This way, you are able to create the tangible product that provides the best and most appealing user experience for the most economical cost, an that can challenge and validate assumptions about a product's requirements.
MVP.businessDelivery: Please clearly mention the structure of your sales cycle from contact to delivery.
MVP.financial: If your plan has a financial model, please upload it.

FirstSale.description: In business, product development (PD) covers the complete process of bringing a new product to market, renewing an existing product and introducing a product in a new market. You need to create a brand that helps you stand out from competitors by connecting with the values and emotions of your target customer. Among various business considerations, product design and the transformation into a product available for sale, and finally the means for it to generate income are the most important factors.

SaleDevelopment.description: Collaborate with manufacturers to ensure a high quality product delivered to buyer's doors that exceeds customer expectations. Sales development is usually an organization that sits between the marketing and sales functions of a business and is responsible for the front-end of the sales cycle including identifying, connecting with, and qualifying leads. They normally set up qualified meetings between a salesperson and potential buyers with a high probability of purchasing a product.

you can book a free consultation with our experts to evaluate your eligibility and explore the right path forward.

formDescription: If you are an entrepreneur, a business owner, or have an innovative startup idea and want to accelerate your growth, we are here to support you on your journey toward global success.
Book your free consultation today and let’s start this path together.

If you’re interested in applying for Canada’s Provincial Entrepreneur Program and starting your own business in Canada, this opportunity allows you to generate income while securing permanent residency for yourself and your family.
Book a free consultation with our experts today to assess your eligibility and find the right path for your future.
